t: Watch LIFE | Prime Video
s: When LIFE Magazine photographer (Robert Pattinson) is assigned to photograph rising star James Dean before the release of East of Eden, their cross-country road trip from Los Angeles to New York leads to an unbreakable friendship and some of the most iconic images of the age.

s: The subject matter is so vague ... over all film. It's worth the watch. ... The history of Hollywood is like Greek mythology; archetypes are created over time then emulated over ensuing decades.
